question: 1. What is main reason to Collect & Study pottery?

answers.a: it was easily broken, does not decay
answers.c: often the most abundant type of artifact

question: 2.What do you understand by experimental studies?

answers.a: studies consist of controlled experiments used in manufacturing processes by refitting
answers.b: studies consist of controlled experiments used to replicate prehistoric ceramic manufacturing processes
answers.c: studies consist of uncontrolled experiments used to replicate posthistoric ceramic manufacturing processes
